properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.async-buffer-flush-timeout
properties.description: The time in seconds after which the async buffers will be flushed (if no activity) to prevent data loss

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.async-max-pool-size
properties.description: The maximum number of threads allowed in the async pool

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.async-worker-queue-size
properties.description: The size of the queue used for holding async indexing tasks

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.auto-index-management-enabled
properties.description: Used to control if index management is to be enabled or will be controlled externally

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.cluster-health-color
properties.description: The color of the elasticserach cluster to wait for to confirm healthy status

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.document-type-override
properties.description:
Document types are deprecated in ES6 and removed from ES7. This property can be used to disable the use of specific document types with an override. This property is currently used in ES6 module.

Note that this property will only take effect if {@link ElasticSearchProperties#isAutoIndexManagementEnabled} is set to false and index management is handled outside of this module.

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.index-batch-size
properties.description: The size of the batch to be used for bulk indexing in async mode

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.index-prefix
properties.description: The index prefix to be used when creating indices

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.index-replicas-count
properties.description: The number of replicas that the index will be configured to have

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.index-shard-count
properties.description: The number of shards that the index will be created with

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.rest-client-connection-request-timeout
properties.description: The timeout in milliseconds used when requesting a connection from the connection manager

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.task-log-result-limit
properties.description: The number of task log results that will be returned in the response

properties.name: conductor.elasticsearch.url
properties.description: The comma separated list of urls for the elasticsearch cluster. Format -- host1:port1,host2:port2
